saveMulti.label: Save Multi
saveMulti.tooltip: Save the multi on bot reset. If Disabled multi will revert back to No Multi.

commandCooldown.label: Command Cooldown
commandCooldown.tooltip: Cooldown amount before command can be used again.

helpMessage.label: Click Here For Instructions
helpMessage.tooltip: Opens Window with instructions for Multi.

modCanChangeMessage.label: Mod Access
modCanChangeMessage.tooltip: Allow mods to change custom message from chat.

customMessage.label: Custom Message
customMessage.tooltip: Custom Message to go before multi link.

timerEnabled.label: Enable Timer
timerEnabled.tooltip: Enable timer to post multi in chat at set interval.

timerLength.label: Timer Length (Minutes)
timerLength.tooltip: Amount of time between timer posts in minutes.

timerChatters.label: Chatter Number
timerChatters.tooltip: Amount of posts in chat before timer is posted.
